name: Ojamatch
desc: Send 1 "Ojama" card from your hand or face-up from your field to the GY; add 1 "Ojama" monster with a different name and 1 "Armed Dragon" monster, except "Hardened Armed Dragon", from your Deck and/or GY to your hand, then, immediately after this effect resolves, you can Normal Summon 1 of those monsters. During your Main Phase: You can banish this card from your GY, then target 3 of your banished "Ojama" monsters; shuffle them into the Deck, then draw 1 card.
str1: Normal Summon 1 of the added monsters?
